author: Linda Gillam
comment: Took my money.  Gave me nothing....doesn't download.  Uninstalled. Reinstalled nothing.   That's not ok

author: saddique yousaf
comment: Its almost more than 30 mins that i have installed this app but still no sign of any watch face in Androidware app yet.

author: Ronnie Mitchum
comment: Just updated to note 7 and it says it's installed, however I can't see the app. Worked great on s7 edge. I can see the watch face on my phone now, however not the app.

reply.author: azya
reply.content: Hello! Try to remove the application, and then install it again (just after the installation , wait a few minutes, the watchfaces are not immediately appear in the list)

title: Can't see app on new phone

author: Ken Rowe
comment: It doesn't show up on my Huawei. Its updated to Android 2.0 and still it's a no show. Uninstalling. Forcing it to work generally means it will be probably be a drain on my battery. It needs development.

author: Frank Schmidt
comment: Weather is not showing up. Instead it shows a question mark.

reply.author: azya
reply.content:
Hello!
Please open the watchface settings on your phone and select your location.

title: Weather service does not work

author: David Brown
comment: I have a galaxy s7 it shows the watch faces on my watch but app doesn't show up on my phone even after Uninstalling so weather only shows question marks
title: It doesn't do what I want

comment: cant see the watchfaces on andriod wear 2.0 did uninstall reinstall and even reset the watch

author: Martin Jackson
comment: Won't show up on my G watch after resync and waited 10min and sync again
title: Not work

author: Pablo Sama
comment: I mainly bought the app for weather face and as of now it doesn't seem to be working it 20:30 and the face is showing a midday sun
title: The weather face

author: karry herrington
comment: Multiple displays that meet the mood of the day. Concise and easy to use
title: Very varied

author: john wyer
comment: Sorted works perfectly now thanks

reply.author: azya
reply.content: Hello! Please try the new version (1.9)

author: Rudolph Browd
comment: Can not get it to work, have new phone and watch, all other faces work

author: Patrick
comment: Worth the purchase of you like simple casual watches.  Unfortunately nothing I would use for a night on the town
title: Not bad at all

author: James Frary
comment: On the digital wear electronic face. The 1s in the date look like 7s.
title: Numbers are wrong

author: Carl Graser
comment: Very cheap looking definitely not worth paying for

author: Sander Embregts
comment: It's not working anymore

author: Jackson
comment: I love this app the watches are awesome.
title: Terrific!

author: Efrain Rosado
comment: Just gorgeous watch faces

author: Mark Bobbink
comment: Much improved !

author: M Ashi
comment: Great watch faces

author: Plamen Panayotov
comment: Excellent!
title: Good app

author: Fawad Badar
comment: Cool
Beautiful faces. I especially like the changing sky. Would be 5 stars if it allowed you to display the date in addition to the time and temp.

reply.author: azya
reply.content:
Hello!
In the latest version, I added a date display in ambient mode.

title: Almost perfect

author: SHAHED HUSSIN
comment: Using it on moto 360.very battery friendly. Also gives accurate feedback of features.
title: Wrok perfect

author: JaCam
comment: All the faces looks and works perfectly on my Moto 360. Hope to see more faces in the future. Keep it up!
title: Awesome.

author: Leonid Khutornyuk
comment: Хороший выбор циферблатов и не дорого
title: Отлично

author: Brian Slaughter
comment: Would love to see more watch faces.
title: Works perfect

author: angelo piperni
comment: I would give this 5 stars but I have the Moto 360 and it doesn't account for the flat tire at the bottom and numbers are hidden. Also the day and date don't show up on faces which really stinks
title: Blank screen

author: Brion Fallon
comment: Im super tech saavy and I live for new tech.  I have a moto 360 and a gear 2 with s4 and lg g2 amongst other high end android stuff.  This app really misses the mark on compatibility, UI, and tutorials.  Dont like it.
title: Im not a noob...

author: Don C
comment: Start up lag kills it. Other developers have figured it out. The watch faces are pretty ugly to. Every face is on the watch and not the app. This could  be the best, but as it stands now,  far from it.

reply.author: azya
reply.content:
Hello! 
Please tell me which model you have Android Wear watch? I'm testing the application on the LG G Watch and Moto 360, where no lag at startup is not observed.

title: Ok but...

author: scott sasamoto
comment: Would love to see this on my watch and I paid for this but it won't install... Error -24... Can't get a refund or anything... I'll give a 2 🌟 until it is fixed...
title: Error -24

author: Jeffrey West
comment: Overall it is a good app and a few good faces but you cannot control color of numbers when changing background color. Once complete customization comes I will change to 5 stars

reply.author: azya
reply.content:
Hello! 
Color of numbers may be changed in the section "Coloring clock".

title: Lacks certain customization.

author: Jamie MacFarlane
comment: Love the app. But hate all the watch faces are on my watch. Would be much nicer if like other apps you just choose on your phone and send to the watch what you want.
title: Like it but.

author: Darren Steer
comment: Some of the best & highest clarity faces ive seen since getting my Moto360 two weeks ago. Can't wait for more faces. Must buy for any Wear owner.
title: Awesome

author: jim bessette
comment: I love two of the watch faces. Would use as an everyday face, but I can only get about half a day with them. I've try all configurations it just hard on battery life. Fix that and five stars.
title: Eats the battery.

author: Phil Jean-Simon
comment: Great faces and ability to customize the colors. My only issue is when I invert clock color,  the date and day disappear, please fix 😊
title: Nice app

author: John Uhles
comment: Touch screen stopped on moto 360, really hoping it wasn't this app because I want it on my new replacement watch.
title: Black & white is easy on the battery

author: John Gee
comment: Great watch faces and so nice to have a combo face digital and analogue. Some of the faces don't seem to change much when in stby other than the seconds disappearing. The weather ones are great in stby. Would be good to have stby mode for all faces.( UPDATE -- HAD OLD FIRMWARE OM WATCH, NOW STBY MODE WORKING ON ALL FACES) looking forward to the new faces coming soon
title: Great style and function

author: Shaun H
comment: Really well designed faces and ability to modify colours and have battery status and weather is great.  But there needs to be some consideration for the notification tiles, which for some faces completely blocks the time.  The last face added though has addressed that issue
title: Great faces but need improvements

author: Chris Edwards
comment: Specifically in the "HD" weather ones. There is no date (Wed. Oct 8) on the main screen, yet it shows in ambient mode?

reply.author: azya
reply.content:
Hello! 
I will add the date in the next update.

title: Would love to see date in normal mode
